fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, offer someone a card.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you offer someone a card, they may select any role. They become that role.
- Each role is a card, and you only have one of each card. If someone tries to take a card you don't have, you attack them.
- You may withhold up to 50 cards at once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Directly or indirectly cause the death of 5 players.
